column5: Awesome Simon   This calls for a Tims double double Congrats mon ami
Quit smoking 1 year ago today  Quit drugs and alcohol 17 years ago today   only my shoplifting, internet, donut and fishing addictions left to beat.....never gonna happen!
Congratulations Simon, that's definetely a couple  accomplishments to be VERY proud of !!
HAHAHAHA Good on you Simon. I gotta say though that beer is safer than internet. Happy anniversary to you...it's a tough haul but, you can do it cause like I've said in the past...you're a good son.
Congrats!
Congrats Simon. That is awesome.
Keep Up the Good Work.........  ...we're all PROUD of YOU.....
Congrats Simon
Must be pretty awesome to sit on your deck with a coffee and absorb everything your new lifestyle has given you on a day like today.  I assume this is why you picked "Dryden"?
Congrats Simon, quite an accomplishment. I'm proud of you.
Congrats!
Atta boy Simon!! That deserves a day of fishing for sure!!
congrats ! and keep up with the fishing reports ...
Even though most of us know you only through the internet.....you are one of those guys that make our lives a little better.  Congrats, and thanks!
Nice going Simon !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! I am very proud of you:clapping:
Mnay happy returns to that one (two) Simon. What were once habits are now vices.

Simon, I can’t say I’ve suffered any forms of serious addictions to anything (aside from fishing). I will say that after going through various health problems throughout my life, it’s always worth celebrating victories, big, small and everything in between.  Big congrats
Congrats!!!
That's great Simon.  Cheers to the next 17 to come.
Those are two enormous obstacles you overcame, congratulations ! Very inspirational for those who may find themselves in similar circumstances.
Congrats. Maybe you have a HOARDING issue with all your fishing gear?
"Sex, drugs, and rock 'n' roll... take out the drugs and you've got more time for the other two." - Steven Tyler  Congrats, man.  And let's hear it for shoplifting!
Warm congrat's Simon. Accomplishments to be proud of!
Thanks for all of the incredibly generous words of encouragement.  You guys really are like family to me.....   THANK YOU
First off,good on ya bud.Second,Im sure Jack, is the proudest of all.He gets to go  with his pop.  Enjoy.

Can't speak from personal experience on both counts Simon but from what little I know on those issues you sure deserve congratulations on firmly standing your ground. Good for you Bud!  Cheers, Ice Fisherman
